hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
OMERO_INSTALL=/tmp/omero-install/linux source $OMERO_INSTALL/settings.env
# UNZIP OMERO.py OMERO_PY_DIST=$WORKSPACE/OMERO.py
ZIP=$(ls OMERO.py*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERO_PY_DIST
# UNZIP openmicroscopy OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST=$WORKSPACE/openmicroscopy
ZIP=$(ls openmicroscopy*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST
# UNZIP SERVER OMERO_SERVER_DIST=$WORKSPACE/OMERO.server
ZIP=$(ls OMERO.server*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERO_SERVER_DIST
# CREATE a virtual environment virtualenv $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv --system-site-packages source $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv/bin/activate
cd $OMERO_SERVER_DIST bash $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/training_setup.sh mv training_ice.config $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training
$OMERO_SERVER_DIST/bin/omero sessions clear
# Run the Python and Java examples
export ICE_CONFIG=$OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/training_ice.config
# OMERO.py examples pip install --upgrade requests export PYTHONPATH=$OMERO_PY_DIST/lib/python:$PYTHONPATH python $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/python deactivate
# OMERO.java examples cd $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/java/src javac -cp .:$OMERO_SERVER_DIST/lib/client/* training/*.java java -cp .:$OMERO_SERVER_DIST/lib/client/* training/Setup
